title: One iOS app turns your phone into a scanner, PDF editor, and cloud storage
description: Macworld Scanning documents shouldn’t be such a pain. If you’ve ever wrestled with a bulky printer-scanner or tried to pass off a crooked phone photo as a real scan, you know how frustrating it can be. iScanner makes the whole process way easier. iScanner is an iOS app that turns your device into a high-quality scanner, and right now, you can get a lifetime subscription for just $24.99 (normally $199.90). iScanner automatically finds the edges of your page, flattens everything, and cleans up the image so it actually looks like a proper scan. You can fill out forms, add your signature, and export your file as a PDF, Word doc, or even Excel. It’s fast, clean, and a lot less annoying than dragging out a desktop scanner every time you need to send something. It also does more than just scan documents. You can measure a room, solve math problems from a photo, or even count objects in an image if you’re doing inventory. There’s a built-in PDF editor too, so you can merge files, rearrange pages, add a watermark, or lock a file with a PIN, all without switching apps. If you’re tired of fuzzy document photos or fighting with outdated office gear, iScanner is an easy upgrade with no new hardware and no monthly fees.
